enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
section_title: EMISSIONS FROM INTERNATIONAL AVIATION AND MARITIME TRANSPORT
sentences: Informal consultations were facilitated by José Romero (Switzerland), with delegates considering draft conclusions.
Highlighting various methodological and other issues, the EU suggested setting out a process, which might include a workshop or other experts` event.
Some other Parties, including the US, questioned whether or not a workshop was needed.
SAUDI ARABIA objected to the EU proposal, preferring shorter text that did not elaborate on the issue.
